statements: SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_authorities;
SELECT outlet_name, censorship_status FROM media_regulatory_authorities;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE censorship_status = TRUE;
SELECT outlet_name FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE media_outlet_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_authorities ORDER BY outlet_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE censorship_status = TRUE;
SELECT outlet_name FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE media_outlet_id = 1;
SELECT media_outlet_id, outlet_name FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE censorship_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM media_regulatory_authorities ORDER BY outlet_name DESC;
SELECT media_outlet_id, outlet_name FROM media_regulatory_authorities WHERE censorship_status = TRUE ORDER BY media_outlet_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, compliance_score FROM MediaOutlets WHERE compliance_score > 0.8;
SELECT outlet_id, name FROM MediaOutlets ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CensorshipRules WHERE severity < 3 ORDER BY rule_id ASC;
SELECT description, keywords FROM CensorshipRules WHERE keywords LIKE '%censor%' OR keywords LIKE '%ban%';
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, compliance_score FROM MediaOutlets ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT outlet_id, name, country FROM MediaOutlets WHERE compliance_score > 0.8 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CensorshipRules WHERE severity BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT rule_id, description, keywords FROM CensorshipRules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets;
SELECT id, name FROM MediaOutlets WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, country FROM MediaOutlets ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_media_outlets FROM MediaOutlets;
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets WHERE country='USA';
SELECT name, country FROM MediaOutlets WHERE id=1;
SELECT count(*) AS total_reports, compliance_level FROM ComplianceReports GROUP BY compliance_level;
SELECT vr.violation_description, cr.report_date FROM Violations vr INNER JOIN ComplianceReports cr ON vr.report_id = cr.report_id AND cr.compliance_level='High';
SELECT m.name AS outlet_name, v.violation_description FROM MediaOutlets m LEFT JOIN Violations v ON m.id = v.report_id WHERE v.violation_date>'2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets
SELECT media_outlet_name, country FROM MediaOutlets
SELECT * FROM CensorshipRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT record_id, violation_description FROM CensorshipRecords WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT authority_name, authority_location FROM RegulatoryAuthorities
SELECT * FROM MediaOutlets WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT media_outlet_name, censorship_compliance FROM MediaOutlets WHERE censorship_compliance = 1;
SELECT MediaOutlets.media_outlet_name, CensorshipRecords.violation_description FROM MediaOutlets JOIN CensorshipRecords ON MediaOutlets.media_outlet_id = CensorshipRecords.media_outlet_id;
SELECT ComplianceHistory.media_outlet_id, ComplianceHistory.record_id, ComplianceHistory.compliance_status FROM ComplianceHistory WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';

SELECT RegulatoryAuthorities.authority_name, ComplianceHistory.compliance_status FROM RegulatoryAuthorities JOIN ComplianceHistory ON RegulatoryAuthorities.authority_id = ComplianceHistory.media_outlet_id;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets ORDER BY outlet_name DESC;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM media_outlets WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM media_content WHERE outlet_id = 2;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM content_reviews WHERE compliance_result = FALSE;

SELECT tracking_id, outlet_name, rule_description, review_date FROM compliance_tracking INNER JOIN media_outlets ON compliance_tracking.outlet_id = media_outlets.outlet_id INNER JOIN censor_rules ON compliance_tracking.rule_id = censor_rules.rule_id ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM media_outlets WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM media_content WHERE outlet_id = 2;
SELECT outlet_name, location FROM media_outlets WHERE outlet_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT cr.rule_description, cc.content_title FROM censor_rules cr JOIN media_content cc ON cr.rule_id = cc.outlet_id;
SELECT cr.rule_description, mr.reviewer_name, mr.review_date FROM censor_rules cr JOIN content_reviews mr ON cr.review_id = mr.review_id;
